title: Health King AllergEase Herb Tea - Support Seasonal Immune Balance 1.2 oz
text:
Naturally delicious, Health King®️ AllergEase Herb Tea is made of wild Angelica Dahurica Root and Fructus Kochiae from the pollution-free area of northeast China, combined with other precious herbs. Based on Traditional Chinese herbalism, this delicious and soothing combination formula supports a healthy immune system and seasonal changes immune response.*
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
